snippet.title: Frogun ENCORE ►Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
GET READY FOR A RIBBITIN' RETURN TO RETRO! Filled with love and nostalgia for the PS1/N64 era of gaming, FROGUN ENCORE is a dashing standalone follow-up to indie hit FROGUN! Intrepid ruin explorer Renata and her best friend talking frog-gun return, along with Jake and more pals, in a journey across the whole world to prevent the return of Lord Beelzebub. 

Building upon Frogun's retro PS1/N64 collectathon formula, FROGUN ENCORE features expanded movesets, new mechanics, and true couch co-op that'll provide a wealth of content for both new and returning players alike to sink their teeth into. 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2312160/Frogun_Encore/?utm_source=RevealYT
